segments.advisor_message: It's great to hear about your retirement plans. What do you envision for your lifestyle once you retire?
segments.client_message: Well, you know, I’ve been thinking about it a lot lately. I want to travel, maybe go to Europe, especially France or Italy, like I've always dreamed about since I was a kid. And, um, I also want to spend more time with my family. My grandkids are growing up so fast and I don't want to miss out on anything, you know? I just want to enjoy every moment!

segments.advisor_message: That sounds like a wonderful plan! Do you have a specific age in mind for when you'd like to retire?
segments.client_message: Right, so I’m thinking maybe around 65, give or take a year. But of course, I don't want to just stop working. I might want to do some consulting or volunteer work. Like, I don't want to be sitting around doing nothing! Just trying to keep busy while still enjoying life, you know?
